title.title: Promoting Library Accessibility and Outreach with Special Collections in Virtual Reality

author.affiliation: University of Colorado, United States of America

sourceDesc.p: Converted from an OASIS Open Document

keywords.term: software development, systems, analysis and methods
virtual and augmented reality creation, systems, and analysis

body.p: This lightning talk will introduce the Special Collections of CU Fairytale Library in Virtual Reality (SCCUFL-VR), an open-source virtual library featuring books from the University of Colorado’s collection of rare and historical fairy tale books, and will discuss the uses of SCCUFL-VR for pedagogy and outreach as well as SCCUFL’s advantages over traditional digital collections.
